data.name: sqlScriptForNewDatabase
data.value:
/****** Object: Database [95] Script Date: 26/05/1400 11:48:54 ق.ظ ******/ CREATE DATABASE [95] CONTAINMENT = NONE ON PRIMARY ( NAME = N'95', FILENAME = N'AddressFileForSave\95.mdf' , SIZE = 4288KB , MAXSIZE = UNLIMITED, FILEGROWTH = 1024KB ) LOG ON ( NAME = N'95_log', FILENAME = N'AddressFileForSave\95_log.ldf' , SIZE = 1344KB , MAXSIZE = 2048GB , FILEGROWTH = 10%) GO
ALTER DATABASE [95] SET COMPATIBILITY_LEVEL = 120 GO IF (1 = FULLTEXTSERVICEPROPERTY('IsFullTextInstalled')) begin EXEC [95].[dbo].[sp_fulltext_database] @action = 'enable' end GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_NULL_DEFAULT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_NULLS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_PADDING OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ANSI_WARNINGS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ARITHABORT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_CLOSE ON GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_SHRINK OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS ON GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET CURSOR_DEFAULT GLOBAL GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET RECURSIVE_TRIGGERS OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ENABLE_BROKER GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET AUTO_UPDATE_STATISTICS_ASYNC OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET DATE_CORRELATION_OPTIMIZATION OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET ALLOW_SNAPSHOT_ISOLATION OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET PARAMETERIZATION SIMPLE GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT ON GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET HONOR_BROKER_PRIORITY OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET RECOVERY SIMPLE GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET MULTI_USER GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET PAGE_VERIFY CHECKSUM GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET DB_CHAINING OFF GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET FILESTREAM( NON_TRANSACTED_ACCESS = OFF ) GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET TARGET_RECOVERY_TIME = 0 SECONDS GO ALTER DATABASE [95] SET DELAYED_DURABILITY = DISABLED GO USE [95] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[__MigrationHistory] Script Date: 26/05/1400 11:48:55 ق.ظ ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[__MigrationHistory]( [MigrationId] [nvarchar](150) NOT NULL, [ContextKey] [nvarchar](300) NOT NULL, [Model] [varbinary](max) NOT NULL, [ProductVersion] [nvarchar](32) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.__MigrationHistory] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [MigrationId] ASC, [ContextKey] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] TEXTIMAGE_ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Applicants] Script Date: 26/05/1400 11:48:55 ق.ظ ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Applicants]( [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, [ApplicantTitle] [nvarchar](150) NOT NULL, [Description] [nvarchar](250) NULL, [CompanyID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.Applicants] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[ApplicationUsers] Script Date: 26/05/1400 11:48:55 ق.ظ ******/ SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TABLE [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL, [LimetedCompany] [bit] NOT NULL, [Enabled] [bit] NOT NULL, [CompanyID_FK] [int] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_dbo.ApplicationUsers] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( [UserId] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY] ) ON [PRIMARY] GO /****** Object: Table [dbo].[Cleams] Script Date:
